product_description: Product Description Now toddlers can enjoy their pool party in an innovative way by opting for Green Toys Submarine. This yellow color watercraft is made with 100% recycled plastic milk jugs which are safe for earth as well as your child. This pool toy is a BPA and Phthalate Free and conforms to FDA standards to ensure your toddlers stay safe even if they try licking it. This toy submarine features a spinning rear propeller along with a flat bottom that helps in offering stability to the toy. This indoor and outdoor toy is provided with a classic handle that would maintain a child’s strong grip while enjoying scooping and pouring. Dimensions-10.25 L x 5.25 W x 4.5 H inches From the Manufacturer Take the helm of the Green Toys Submarine for a nautical journey to help protect the planet. Submerge it underwater to explore the terrain at the bottom of the tub and let it resurface to scan the horizon in search of the next adventure. Made in the USA from 100% recycled plastic milk jugs that save energy and reduce greenhouse gas emissions, this sturdy watercraft features a spinning rear propeller, a flat bottom for added stability, and the classic handle and wide-mouth opening combination for plenty of scoop and pour fun. The cabin can be opened for easy cleaning, while the whole vessel is also dishwasher safe. No BPA, phthalates, PVC or external coatings and also meets FDA food contact standards. Packaged with recycled and recyclable materials and printed with soy inks. Recommended for ages 6 months and above. Dimensions-10.25 L x 5.25 W x 4.5 H inches

name: Electric Simulated Submarine Toy, Large-Sized Science and Educational Model Toy Nuclear Submarine Model Toy Submarine Bathtub Toy Submarine Pool Toy with Strong Motor (8821)
short_description: Move in the Water: With a powerful motor on the bottom, these electric submarine toys can move around on the surface and even in the water. To start the toy, we just need to twist the motor slightly.

Cool Submarine Model Toy: These submarine toys mimic real submarines in terms of shape and look really cool. In addition, its dimensions are long enough to reach 13 inches. The submarine model toys are good science and educational toy for child.

Waterproof and Detachable Motor: These submarine model toys feature an independent and detachable design. At the same time, the motor adopts a sealed and waterproof design, which can effectively prevent water from entering the inside of the battery compartment. When replacing the battery, simply remove it.
The Magic of Floating and Diving: There are holes above and below the submarine toys, and when the submarines are pressed into the water, the water enters the interior, causing the submarine to sink.

Fun for Bathtub and Swimming Pool: With the cool shape and funny function, the electric submarine toys can easily appeal to kids. They are suitable for multiple occasions that can play in the bathtub or in the pool.

name: Wind-up Diver Submarine Bath Toy, Funny Swimming Frogman Pigboat Scuba SUB Bathtub Toy Clockwork Tub Water Toy for Kids (Diver+Submarine)
short_description: Funny Bath Toy: This submarine and the diver are very cool in its appearance. Nearly all the features in the real submarine and the diver can be found in the toy. Most importantly, the bathtub toy can move in the water as the propeller turns or its legs moves.

No Batteries Required: With the windup design, it works without the requirement of batteries. Turn the clockwork in the bottom of the pigboat or the frogman, then this toy will get winded up. After being put it into water, it will move forward automatically.

Good Playmate for Kids: With the cool appearance and the funny function, kids can be easily attracted by the submarine toy or the diver especially if your kid is a military fan. With the light-weight and portable features, it can be played in various occasions: bathtub, swimming pool and beach.

Healthy and Safe Toy: This SUB toy and the frogman tub toy are made of ABS plastics material features in non-toxic and tasteless. The structure of the toy is solid enough to avoid it from being broken easily.

Easy To Play: Both the 2 bath toy are easy to play, most kids can play it independently. Turn the clockwork in the bottom of the toy clockwise and press the propeller or legs at the same time. Then put it into water, it will move forward as the propellers turns or the diver kicks up and down automatically.
product_description: What's About This Product: Name: Wind-up Submarine + Windup Diver Material: ABS Plastics Age: 12 Months+ Submarine Dimension: 6.5 * 8 * 23cm/ 2.56 * 3.15 * 9.05inch Diver Dimension: 6 * 7 * 19cm/ 2.36 * 2.76 * 7.48inch Package Content: 1 * Submarine 1 * Diver How To Play? Submarine 1. Turn the clockwork in the bottom clockwise; 2. Put the submarine into the water, it will moves in the water as its propeller turns automatically. Submarine 1. Turn the clockwork in the back clockwise; 2. Put the diver into the water, it will moves in the water as its legs moves automatically.

The electric submarine sprinkler bath toy is also easy to clean, making it a convenient choice for parents.

This baby bath toy is made of quality ABS plastic that is free from harmful ingredients, and its surface is smooth with rounded edges to ensure safe play. Shower Head Bath Toy turns baby bathing time into a Happy fun. With this creartive and lovely submarine toy, traditional shower head can be replaced, which adds a lot fun for kids in bathtub.

Secure Suction Cup: This baby shower toy can not only be used as a floating toy, but also comes with a soft suction cup to attach it securely to the bathtub. The suction cup ensures that the toy stays in place, even during active play. Excellent performance tube and shower head hose can be adjusted 360°, not easy to damage.

Easy to Use: Operating this shower toy is easy. Just insert 4 AAA batteries(NOT INCLUDED) into the Water Toys, press the periscope of the submarine, and then place the submarine in the water to start playing.

Cute Design and Fun Feature: With its adorable submarine shape and water spray function, this bathtub toy is both cute and entertaining for kids. Kids can watch as the pump in the bottom of the submarine draws in water and sprays it out through the shower head at the top. The submarine is powerful and the small holes of the shower head are evenly distributed and the water will be evenly sprayed
